name: Dicey Racer
description:
Made in 48 hours for the GMTK 2022 Game Jam following the theme of Roll of the Dice.

 Once a famous racecar driver, your glory days are far behind you. Unfortunately, you never learned how to let go of your thirst for living on the edge and soon gambling debts started piling up. 

With little option you took to the road once more, this time with a thirst for victory driving you to cheat. 

As the player, you'll be taking a risk by placing down traps in the path of your opponents that can affect you as well. Without careful and sound judgement, you will be the one in last place instead! Be successful however, and you'll be taking home the prize with all debts wiped away.
